hero.subtitle: Discover partners, projects, and collaboration opportunities in Kosovo's circular economy network. Join our community to build a more sustainable future.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Connect with organizations and individuals who share the same values for sustainability.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Contribute to projects that promote circular economy and environmental protection.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Discover innovative solutions and new technologies for environmental challenges.

hero.subtitle: ECO HUB KOSOVA is Kosovo's first circular economy platform, created to connect partners, promote collaboration, and build a sustainable economy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To create a platform that facilitates collaboration between organizations, businesses, and individuals to build a sustainable circular economy in Kosovo.
mission.description2: We believe that through networking, knowledge exchange, and collaboration, we can create a greener and more sustainable future for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: To become the leading platform for circular economy in the Western Balkans, serving as a model for other countries in the region.
vision.description2: We aim for a Kosovo where waste is minimized, resources are reused, and the economy develops in harmony with the environment.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.desc: We promote practices that preserve the environment and ensure a sustainable future.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.desc: We believe in the power of collaboration to achieve common goals.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: We operate with full transparency and responsibility towards the community.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We support innovative solutions for circular economy challenges.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Circular Economy Coalition
team.description: ECO HUB KOSOVA is supported by the Circular Economy Coalition, a group of organizations and experts committed to promoting circular economy in Kosovo.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.description: Be part of the movement for a more sustainable economy in Kosovo

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact us for any questions, suggestions or collaboration

form.title: Send a message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible
form.subject: Subject

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: You can contact us through the following ways

offices.title: Regional Offices
offices.description: Find the office nearest to you

social.description: Follow our updates on social media

footer.description: Kosovo's first circular economy platform for a sustainable future.
footer.supportedBy: Supported by the Circular Economy Coalition

hero.supportedBy: Supported by the Circular Economy Coalition
hero.subtitle: Kosovo's first circular economy platform. Connect with partners, discover opportunities, and create sustainable circulation for a greener future.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start collaborating in the circular economy
howItWorks.step1Body: Register as an individual or organization and create your profile on the platform to start networking.
howItWorks.step2Body: Explore potential partners, knowledge articles, and collaboration opportunities in the marketplace.
howItWorks.step3Body: Contact potential partners and begin collaboration on sustainable and innovative projects.

marketplace.title: Circular Economy Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Discover marketplace opportunities for sustainable materials, products, and services
marketplace.forSaleBody: Discover available materials, products, and services from network partners for the circular economy.
marketplace.wantedBody: Discover requests for materials, products, and services from network partners for joint projects.

common.albanianOnlyDescription: This page is currently only available in Albanian. We're working on translating it to English. Please switch to Albanian (SQ) using the language selector in the header.
